title: Cost recovery
text:
This component refers to policies that ensure that issues relating to the recovery of costs for the provision of NMHS climate data services are clearly understood and communicated.

These policies should also take into account:
1. NMHS commitments to WMO relating to Resolutions 25 (Cg-XIII) and 40 (Cg-XII), as discussed above.
2. National commitments to open data policies.
